page.title: 13SHREWTON FARM BY A LOCAL LAD
page.content: I live on Shrewton Farm in a cottage with my Mum, Dad and two brothers. My Dad looks after 100 fresian cows. He milks them twice a day at 5 O'clock in the morning and 3 O'clock in the afternoon. Some of the cattle are dry cows waiting to have their calves, and they are in a field near our house. My brothers and I, we see all the new calves when they are born. Ian feeds the calves when their mums go back to the herd for milking. Mr. Grant the farmer grows many acres of silage hay, corn and grass to feed the cows. There is a lot of machinery for the land work. There are seven tractors, three combine harvesters, ploughs and many other things. I like living on a farm!
